questions.question_text: After you deploy a Layer 4 "" Layer 7 service graph in Cisco ACI, where do you modify the parameters of the Layer 4 "" Layer 7 device(s)?

choices.B: under the Provider EPG > L4-L7 Service Parameters
choices.C: under the Consumer EPG > L4-L7 Service Parameters
FC_ID 0x5e003c is that of the storage array
choices.D: FC_ID 0x5e003c is that of the HBA
choices.E: FC_ID 0x5e003c is that of the MDS or Cisco Nexus 5000 Series Switch
choices.A: FC_ID 0x5e01ef is that of the storage array
choices.B: FC_ID 0x5e01ef is that of the MDS or Cisco Nexus 5000 Series Switch

discussion.content: B+D are correct. The plogi is not caused by an end device (such as the FC array) but from a neigbor FC switch (such as MDS or N5K).

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. You have been investigating an issue with your Cisco UCS blade booting from remote Fibre Channel storage. Upon inspection, you see the output in the exhibit. Which two statements are true? (Choose two.)

choices.A: only FabricPath encapsulated frames can be sent out of the interface

discussion.content:
B is correct.
The reference states clearly that only CE Vlans are allowed to the southbound vpc ports.

All VLANs that are meant to be forwarded across FabricPath cloud must be defined as
FabricPath VLANs. By default, all VLANs are in CE mode. These CE VLANs are not
brought up on FabricPath links. They can be forwarded on the FabricPath edge ports (802.1q
trunk ports) locally or to other Classic Ethernet switches. 
so D

questions.question_text: vPC+ is configured between two Cisco Nexus 5600 Series Switches. Which type of VLANs can be added to a trunk on a vPC port channel?

discussion.content: D. The question is about goal. The goal is to act as a single router. D- is correct
B. Configure the MAC address of the vPC peer as a gateway MAC.

choices.D: Act as a single router when peering dynamic routing protocols over a vPC.
choices.B: Configure the MAC address of the vPC peer as a gateway MAC.
choices.A: Use the same bridge ID when sending BPDUs from switches in a vPC pair.
choices.C: Transmit BPDUs from the secondary and primary vPC switch.

questions.question_text: Which goal of peer-gateway in vPC is true?
What is the correct location where the DPDK libraries run?
